name: EL SAZON DEL MUJERON REST
address: 760 Grand Concourse PART 4, Bronx, NY 10451, USA

reviews.text:
Estaba cerrado
En Google mostraba abierto
Flavorful and filling food with good portion sizes. I love the carne guisada and the many rice options. Can’t go wrong with a beer on the side
Excelente comida …. Verdadero sazón Dominicano …
La comida es regular  pero los precios soy muy altos

Es Buena la comida pero los precios son total diferente . Tienes que espesificar Bien los precios dos Plato de comida  y dos jugos 45 dollars cuando dicen que el especial de lonche es 9.99 pero cuando pide la cuenta te dan el verdadero tablaso . La dueña no le importa porque le referi lo de El precios y Ella dijo que no es lo que Ella dice es que es su precios y despues de comer hay que pagar pero este espacio no c lo recomiendo anadie...... sorry pero la comida es decente pero no para pagar 45 por dos manguuu no ......

Ellos tienen una promoción de especial del lunch en 7.99 pero cuando te cobran te cobran 12.86 por arroz habichuela carne no más… para el lugar, la condición que no es la mejor del sitio no califica, si pagas con tarjeta te cobran un cargo extra … no vuelvo …
They have this sign in the entrance? I ask for the lunch special. No drink, no plastic bag to take out, and charge $14 cash insane this people never , never, again
Really homemade food. Great portions too.
The food is really really good! Feels like home
Buen Ambiente
To many drunkin men in and out the restaurant horrible
Nice customer service but not enough daily variety of foods. The food is decent.
Great food
Necesita mas limpieza y mejor selección de comida..
Place is clean and the service is amazing ! Best restaurant around!!
Service and staff was excellent definently reccomend to friends and family
Mauvais service

Terrible customer service. The woman serving food was eating a piece of meat she did not have on sterile gloves. Another woman was preparing a salad also without gloves. The man who cooks came to the front picking in his nose and coughed in hand. Horrible.. I'll not recommend anybody to eat there
Super bueno, la comida está perfecta, lo recomoendo a todo el que este buscando comida dominicana en el Bronx. Y no olviden el norísoñando.
Food is criole, very good.
Clean restaurant. All of the food looked good. Dominican meat patties were  very good.
I'm truly enjoying myself

Worst customer service, came for lunch, I asked for menu and the lady very rude told me that they did not have a menu, I asked for recommendations and she gave me looks like I am crazy. First this was my first and last time to come to the restaurant, I came because of the reviews on google but I won’t recommend this place at all!
Rica la comida encontramos exactamente lo q queriamos comer
Ok service
Good Food, excellent service, the location is a little bit hard to find but once you’re there is great
Food is great.
Buenisima
Buffet style Caribbean food.  The chicken was really good
